name: CreateNewContact
description:
Create a new contact in the Intercom system.

Use this tool to add a new contact, either a user or a lead, to the Intercom database.

parameters.name: contact_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to create a contact, like email, name, role.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
